body_html: I think the perplexity needs to go to around 4 for the results to be good. On a single GPU, this can take about a month of training with this simple tutorial script. There is a lot that can be sped up there, and better parameter settings can help, but I hope that gives you a general idea for the expectations.

body: I think the perplexity needs to go to around 4 for the results to be good. On a single GPU, this can take about a month of training with this simple tutorial script. There is a lot that can be sped up there, and better parameter settings can help, but I hope that gives you a general idea for the expectations.
